item.title: GitHub For Babies- Part 2
item.description: Welcome back to Part 2 of the GitHub series. Now, we create a text file named index.txt and add a line in the text file for example print(“hello!”). Now perform the previous command again: git status After this command, It will display some message stating untracked files meaning that some changes have been made to this folder which is not tracked by git yet and it is red marked.

item.title: GitHub For Babies
item.description: You Perhaps heard the name of GitHub but haven’t had the occassion to dive deep into it, Right? Then I must say you in the right place. The intention of this post is to make you understand Git,GitHub and its mechanism like you are a grade 5 student. Warning! If you want to be an expert then I would say you are in wrong place. Let’s start!
